bill_title: appropriate funds for infrastructure and improvements at the Rapid City Regional Airport and to declare an emergency.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to appropriate funds for infrastructure and improvements at the Rapid City Regional Airport and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of $3,000,000, to the South Dakota Aeronautics Commission for the installation of a hangar area at Rapid City Regional Airport. The funds shall be used to install, replace, or repair necessary infrastructure and public safety improvements, such as water and sewer mains, fire hydrants, taxiways and runways, roads, and other similar projects. Section 2. The commission shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.

An Act to appropriate funds for infrastructure and improvements at the Rapid City Regional Airport and to declare an emergency. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of $3,000,000, to the South Dakota Aeronautics Commission for base infrastructure at the Rapid City Regional Airport. The monies shall be used to install, replace, or repair necessary infrastructure and public safety improvements, such as water and sewer mains, fire hydrants, roads, and other similar projects. Section 2. The commission shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated shall revert in accordance with the procedures prescribed in chapter 4-8. Section 4. Whereas, this Act is necessary for the support of the state government and its existing public institutions, an emergency is hereby declared to exist, and this Act shall be in full force and effect from and after its passage and approval.
